text_block_list.text: The summer training camp passed safely, the season is completely autumnー However, the Twinkle Series is engulfed in the heat of midsummer.
At the center of the heat was the sisters Narita Brian and Biwa Hayahide.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian won the “Kikkashou”, surpassing last years time recorded by Biwa Hayahide!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Here is the birth of the 5th ever “Triple Crown Horse Girl”!!
One sister showed a landslide victory at the “Japan Derby”, and the other sister released a record at the “Takarazuka Kinen”, after that, which sister will make a big record againー
While running different races, the world was greatly excited by the way they collided with each other.
And the direct confrontation between the 2 girls that everyone was waiting for was going to happen in the “Arima Kinen”ー

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Those interviewers are coming today too～. It's a pain in the ass.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's right. After all, the “Triple Crown Horse Girl” is a great achievement.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Who knows when the next time in this historic period will we be able to witness this again. So It is only natural that the coverage will push and come.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well, it seems like everyone is disappointed that they can't find Brian.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Is Brian-san going to visit Hayahide-san?
Oh, I suggest you don't go.
Oh, I suggest you don't go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I asked her out before, but I was refused. It may be that the sincerity of my feelings didn't reach her.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well～, I'm sure it's a shock for a family member.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There is that too but, I think Brian-san was looking forward to running together with her in the “Arima Kinen”.
As Mejiro McQueen said, every time Biwa Hayahide was active, Narita Brian seemed to be excited about it.
She had withered the thought of running so much as to say that the triple crown is a passing point, I wonder if the only thing to satisfy her was the confrontation with her sister.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The other person who she wanted to run with me the most can't run, I'm a little worried…
Brian…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wanted to beat down the “Triple Crown Horse Girl”…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …There is nothing to worry about if you are this energetic.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The injury at the “Emperor Prize (Autumn)” was unexpected. I had already built up a winning equation for the next match against you from the previous ones.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Using equations for racing, your head's way of thinking is still the same as ever.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah, my head is not that big!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …Brian, my equation is not an empty theory on the desk. I'm sure I would have won in the “Arima Kinen”.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Do you remember when you were a little girl when you wore the 1st place at sports day?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: No, it's not in my memory.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I guess so… winning was a matter of course for you, it wasn't so simulating as to remain in your memory, such as the race of the sports day.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Genius mathematicians say that it is a bliss when you're satisfied with a problem that exists, and when you are challenging difficult questions that cannot be solved.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You're the same. Because of your outstanding talent, your feelings can't be satisfied in regular races all the time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You can't beat it with just effort… So I modeled it, and what I found was the way it is now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It is not an empty cloud, but an effort to pursue a theory and do it accurately which shows firmly as a result.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Then, even more so I wanted you to prove it at the “Arima Kinen”.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …The main story of the topic is from here. I have nothing to do at the hospital, so I tried to set up the equation of the “Arima Kinen”, which I can't run.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: As a result, no matter how many times you do the calculations, it will come out when you win.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I don't know what you will think of my run… I'm sure I'll win, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't need an equation to give you an answer. It is natural to win.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Besides, If Big-sister had appeared in “Arima Kinen”, the theory that you would have won over me, is just an empty argument on the table.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: That's why, let me prove it to you someday, for sure.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ahaha… yeah, I promise.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Let me prove my Big-sister's equation, in the “Arima Kinen”!
